thread.title: LendingClub’s Shares Drop Sharply After FTC’s Lawsuit

author: Peter Rudegeair
title: LendingClub’s Shares Drop Sharply After FTC’s Lawsuit
text:
The Federal Trade Commission on Wednesday accused online lender LendingClub Corp. of deceiving borrowers about fees and removing money from their bank accounts without authorization.
Shares in LendingClub fell 15% to close at an all-time low of $2.77. Since the start of 2018, LendingClub’s shares are down nearly 33%.
The FTC said the San...
